Package io.github.ai4ci.util

Interface Repository.Indexed<Y extends Repository.Indexed<Y>>

Type Parameters:
Y - the type of the entity that implements this interface (used for self-referential typing)
All Known Subinterfaces:
UKCensus.AgeGender, UKCensus.Commuting, UKCensus.Distances, UKCensus.Ethnicity, UKCensus.Geography, UKCensus.Industry, UKCensus.Unemployment
Enclosing class:
Repository
public static interface Repository.Indexed<Y extends Repository.Indexed<Y>>
An interface for entities that can be indexed in the repository. This interface requires implementing classes to provide a ValueIndex for their type, which allows them to perform indexed lookups using the repository's indexing mechanism.

    Description
    default <X> Set<X>
    find(Class<X> type, Repository.SerializableFunction<X,Y> fn)

  • Method Details

    • find

      default <X> Set<X> find(Class<X> type, Repository.SerializableFunction<X,Y> fn)
      Find values of type X that link to this entity based on a mapping function that maps X to Y. This is a foreign key lookup equivalent and returns objects that link to this entity. This will generate an index the first time it is called and thereafter use the index.
      Type Parameters:
      X - the return type (the entity type being looked up)
      Parameters:
      type - the class of the return type X
      fn - must be expressed in the form `X::getY` for it to work properly as a key. If it is not then additional indexes will get created.
      Returns:
      a set of values of type X whose `fn` methods return this entity

    • getIndex

      @Redacted Repository.ValueIndex<Y> getIndex()
      Get the ValueIndex for this entity's type. This index is used to perform indexed lookups for this entity type in the repository.
      Returns:
      the ValueIndex for this entity's type
